room_title: Escape room "Dr. Demento" by Room With A Clue in Hartford
room_description:
Dr. Demento started acting very peculiar and fired all his office staff to take a sabbatical.  The strange behavior started  after results of a 23 & Me genetic test when he started forgetting things and discovered he had an incurable brain disease. He became obsessed with brain function, mind manipulation, and started his own clinical trials. 
Suspicions swirl when several people in town go missing, uncle Joe is one of them. Your family wants answers and so do you!
